name: Devil
description: The DEVIL TOKEN (DEVL) is a reward and utility token that gives generous incentives for holders. The more you hold, the more you earn. DEVL pairs proven incentive mechanisms on the Binance Smart Chain network with robust economics and unique features. The fuel to the fire of the DEVIL ECOSYSTEM, holders of DEVL will have the keys to a kingdom of de-fi products that will make the DeFi experience safer, simpler, and more accessible.
